queries.query: INSERT INTO TB_LANCAMENTO( ID_TITULAR, ID_DEPENDENTE, ID_CONTRATO, CD_MES, CD_ANO, LIVRE_01, VL_PRINCIPAL, USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
UPDATE TB_LANCAMENTO SET ID_TITULAR = ?, ID_DEPENDENTE = ?, ID_CONTRATO = ?, CD_MES = ?, CD_ANO = ?, LIVRE_01 = ?, VL_PRINCIPAL = ?, USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
